title: 限制玩家每几秒连接服务器次数的语言在哪修改
author: 幽冥冥
txt_content:

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content:
用压缩包打开BungeeCord.jar
根目录下有个messages.properties
join_throttle_kick=You have connected too fast. You must wait at least {0} seconds between connections.复制代码

replies.author: 幽冥冥
replies.txt_content:
小小马 发表于 2017-1-1 15:12
用压缩包打开BungeeCord.jar
根目录下有个messages.properties
发此贴后20分钟已解决
感谢你的回答
